rookie.title: Rookie Harbor
rookie.description: A bustling port city where a lot of trade, travel, and tourism takes place. Sells standard bronze and iron equipment.

bergen.title: Bergen Village
bergen.description: A small village situated on top of Mount Bergen, notably for its access to resources which is extracted from the mine there. Sells standard iron equipment.

bakii.title: Ba'kii Kum
bakii.description: An oasis in the midst of a scorching hot desert. It's a hotspot for trading due to its market culture. Sells standard iron and steel equipment.

basin.title: Basin Keep
basin.description: A technological powerhouse of a city, most of its economic activity comes from its power generator at Zir'vitar Temple with a side of trading and luxury pursuits. Sells standard silver and titan equipment.

sapphire.title: Sapphire Ridge
sapphire.description: A place popular due to the cobalt mining operations taking place there. The Cave Inn stands there as an inn and place for trading. Sells standard titan and cobalt equipment.

rhombus.title: Rhombus Square
rhombus.description: The capital of human settlements on Shadoon where luxury houses stand and entertainment such as the Rhombus Arena take place. Sells standard cobalt and laser equipment.

teak.title: Ms. Teak's Steaks
teak.description: A businesswoman whose goal it is to grill and sell the perfect steaks in all of Rookie Harbor.

icecream.title: Frosty Arnold's Ice Cream Stand
icecream.description: A Rookie Harbor vendor selling ice cream all the way from the Bergen Trail.

plants.title: Talatu Lips' Botantical Garden
plants.description: A collector of plants from all over Shadoon.

tara.title: Tara's Sandwich Shop
tara.description: A person selling sandwiches for 2,500 credits each. He hopes to make higher profits by selling his wares at a higher price so it'll balance out the customers that don't buy anything, because that's how it works, right?

hermit.title: Hermit's House
hermit.description: A small pub located in the middle of the Bergen Trail.

tophat.title: Bergen Hatmaker
tophat.description: An artisan aiming to make the finest tophats in Bergen.

mine.title: The Bergen Mine
mine.description: A reservoir of minerals overrun by the now-enraged ancient robots and bugs of the slumbering temple below.

brewery.title: The Ba'kii Kum Brewery
brewery.description: A brewery providing drinks to quench the thirst in the heat of the desert.

bazaar.title: The Baki Bazaar Union
bazaar.description: An organization dedicated to the traders and merchants of Ba'kii Kum. Occasionally deals in transportation.

pond.title: The Calzone Shop
pond.description: A business led by Don Vita situated in the rundown section of Basin Keep, the Pond Slums.

zirvitar.title: Zir'vitar Power Plant
zirvitar.description: The primary source of wealth in Basin Keep, providing power for human settlements. This has led to growing tensions between the Shad and the humans however.

booster.title: Boost Lounge
booster.description: A shop in Rhombus Square's shopping district providing boosters buffing monsters in other regions for advanced seekers looking for a challenge and extra loot..

chest.title: Curios Trinkets
chest.description: A shop in Rhombus Square's shopping district selling its prized chest detector for those on the search for treasure.

arena.title: The Rhombus Arena
arena.description: An arena for seekers looking to test their abilities. Also part of Rhombus Square's entertainment sector.
